readable.title: 2364394224_c17b09e035
readable.content: A dog runs for a ball thrown by a small boy . A little boy is playing with his dog in the backyard as the snow melts . A young child is walking alongside a large black and brown dog with snow on the ground . Little boy and a dog are playing in a fenced in backyard with snow on the ground . The boy and the dog are outside in the garden with a little snow still on the ground .
